bedrockwaters.carrotconfig.title: TravellersToasts Configuration!
bedrockwaters.carrotconfig.maxInhabitedT:
Denotes the maximum time (in minutes) a chunk can have a player in its vicinity before biome toasts are prevented from showing within its borders.

(§oHigher values may be preferable for high-player worlds!§r§r)
bedrockwaters.carrotconfig.toastCooldown: Denotes the time (in minutes) a biome toast will be prevented from showing again (§oper biome§r).
